# Poison (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 4]], [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 5]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Living creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous; see text

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 323

Calling upon the venomous powers of natural predators, you infect the subject with a horrible poison by making a successful melee touch attack. This poison deals 1d3 Constitution damage per round for 6 rounds. Poisoned creatures can make a Fortitude save each round to negate the damage and end the affliction.

**GM Note** 

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 4 to Level per *Dungeon Master's Guide*.
